name: Sort Puzzle: Fun Ball
description:
This is a colors sort puzzle game. It’s a simple yet challenging puzzle you won’t be able to put aside.

Sort the colorful balls in to the tubes. How far can you go?

This game is fun and strategic.

HOW TO PLAY:

1. Arrange the color ball in color matching order in tubes

2. Drag and drop balls to match them in logic puzzle

3. Enjoy a good brain teaser game!

4. Beat your high score, and compete with other players in Game Center.

5. Customize the game with a theme of your choice (Woody, Jewel, Fruit, Sport and many other great skins)


Relieve stress, or train your brain with a relaxing, yet challenging, game of Sort Puzzle: Fun Ball® anywhere, any time!
